MOREMANUALDICEROLLS.OverrideHint: Overrides all rolls to manual. ALL dice rolls will be manual, regardless of dice configuration.
MOREMANUALDICEROLLS.cHint: Values are 0 or 1, with 0 being tails and 1 heads. Note: manual entry for this is currently bugged, you cannot enter 0.
MOREMANUALDICEROLLS.fHint: Values are 1 to 3, with 1 being bad and 3 good.
